TITLE: Therapeutic bronchoscopic aspiration – initial and repeat during same hospitalization

SETTING
ICU admission for mucus plugging with lobar atelectasis.

HOSPITAL DAY 1 – MONDAY
Bronchoscopy with therapeutic aspiration of extensive secretions throughout the tracheobronchial tree. Improved ventilation post-procedure.
Moderate sedation by bronchoscopist with independent trained observer.
Sedation Start 13:00, Stop 13:20 (20 minutes).

HOSPITAL DAY 3 – WEDNESDAY (SAME STAY)
Repeat therapeutic aspiration for recurrent mucus plugging performed by the same provider group. Clinical improvement documented.
Moderate sedation by bronchoscopist with observer present.
Sedation Start 10:05, Stop 10:25 (20 minutes).

COMPLICATIONS
None.

DISPOSITION
Improved oxygenation; continued ICU care.
